data.lyric:
[ti:Anyone (Explicit)]
[ar:Demi Lovato]
[al:Anyone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Anyone (Explicit) - Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)
[00:02.12]Lyrics by：Dayyan Alexander/Demi Lovato/Sam Roman/Badriia "Bibi" Bourelly/Jay Moon/Eyelar Mirzazadeh
[00:04.24]Composed by：Dayyan Alexander/Demi Lovato/Sam Roman/Badriia "Bibi" Bourelly/Jay Moon/Eyelar Mirzazadeh
[00:06.37]Uh uh
[00:14.75]I tried to talk to my piano
[00:18.60]I tried to talk to my guitar
[00:22.43]Talked to my imagination
[00:26.02]Confided into alcohol
[00:29.70]I tried and tried and tried some more
[00:33.28]Told secrets 'til my voice was sore
[00:37.07]Tired of empty conversation
[00:40.72]'Cause no one hears me anymore
[00:44.28]A hundred million stories
[00:46.07]And a hundred million songs
[00:48.01]I feel stupid when I sing
[00:51.05]Nobody's listening to me
[00:54.64]Nobody's listening
[00:59.03]I talked to shooting stars
[01:00.80]But they always get it wrong
[01:02.71]I feel stupid when I pray
[01:05.68]So why am I praying anyway
[01:09.26]If nobody's listening
[01:13.99]Anyone please send me anyone
[01:20.16]Lord is there anyone
[01:24.26]I need someone
[01:28.98]Anyone please send me anyone
[01:34.90]Lord is there anyone
[01:38.98]I need someone
[01:58.17]I used to crave the world's attention
[02:01.83]I think I cried too many times
[02:05.73]I just need some more affection
[02:09.78]Anything to get me by
[02:13.09]A hundred million stories
[02:14.63]And a hundred million songs
[02:16.67]I feel stupid when I sing
[02:19.52]Nobody's listening to me
[02:23.24]Nobody's listening
[02:27.63]I talked to shooting stars
[02:29.43]But they always get it wrong
[02:31.23]I feel stupid when I pray
[02:34.06]Why the f**k am I praying anyway
[02:37.81]If nobody's listening
[02:42.73]Anyone please send me anyone
[02:48.82]Lord is there anyone
[02:52.93]I need someone
[02:57.45]Anyone please send me anyone
[03:02.45]Oh Lord is there anyone
[03:07.63]I need someone
[03:11.15]Oh anyone I need anyone
[03:18.18]Oh anyone I need someone
[03:27.02]A hundred million stories
[03:28.55]And a hundred million songs
[03:30.50]I feel stupid when I sing
[03:33.62]Nobody's listening to me
[03:37.36]Nobody's listening
data.trans:
[ti:Anyone (Explicit)]
[ar:Demi Lovato]
[al:Anyone]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.12]//
[00:04.24]//
[00:06.37]//
[00:14.75]我试图与钢琴对话
[00:18.60]我试图与吉他对话
[00:22.43]与我的幻想对话
[00:26.02]借酒浇愁
[00:29.70]我不断尝试
[00:33.28]吐露心中秘密 直到声音沙哑
[00:37.07]厌倦了无关痛痒的交谈
[00:40.72]因为再也没有人倾听我的心声
[00:44.28]说不尽的故事
[00:46.07]还有唱不完的歌
[00:48.01]当我歌唱时 我自觉愚钝
[00:51.05]无人听我诉说
[00:54.64]没有人聆听
[00:59.03]我与流星对话
[01:00.80]可他们总是误解我的意思
[01:02.71]当我祈祷时 我自觉愚钝
[01:05.68]那么为何我要祈祷
[01:09.26]倘若无人聆听
[01:13.99]有人吗  请赐予我听众
[01:20.16]上帝啊 有人否
[01:24.26]我需要陪伴
[01:28.98]有人吗  请赐予我听众
[01:34.90]上帝啊 有人否
[01:38.98]我需要陪伴
[01:58.17]我曾渴望得到全世界的关注
[02:01.83]我想我已流过数不尽的眼泪
[02:05.73]我只是渴望得到更多的爱
[02:09.78]让我熬过伤痛
[02:13.09]说不尽的故事
[02:14.63]还有唱不完的歌
[02:16.67]当我歌唱时 我自觉愚钝
[02:19.52]无人听我诉说
[02:23.24]没有人聆听
[02:27.63]我与流星对话
[02:29.43]可他们总是误解我的意思
[02:31.23]当我祈祷时 我自觉愚钝
[02:34.06]我究竟为何要祈祷
[02:37.81]倘若无人聆听
[02:42.73]有人吗  请赐予我听众
[02:48.82]上帝啊 有人否
[02:52.93]我需要陪伴
[02:57.45]有人吗  请赐予我听众
[03:02.45]上帝啊 有人否
[03:07.63]我需要陪伴
[03:11.15]有人吗 我需要听众
[03:18.18]有人吗 我需要陪伴
[03:27.02]说不尽的故事
[03:28.55]还有唱不完的歌
[03:30.50]当我歌唱时 我自觉愚钝
[03:33.62]无人听我诉说
[03:37.36]没有人聆听
